title: Storage Service
description: This schema defines the Storage Service entity, such as S3, GCS, HDFS.

id.description: Unique identifier of this storage service instance.

name.description: Name that identifies this storage service.

displayName.description: Display Name that identifies this storage service.

serviceType.description: Type of storage service such as S3, GCS, HDFS...

description.description: Description of a storage service instance.

updatedAt.description: Last update time corresponding to the new version of the entity in Unix epoch time milliseconds.

href.description: Link to the resource corresponding to this storage service.

changeDescription.description: Change that lead to this version of the entity.

deleted.description: When `true` indicates the entity has been soft deleted.
